text:
Cedar | www.cedar.com | Onsite | Full Stack Engineer / DevOps Engineer / Forward Deployed Engineer | New York

Cedar is focused on improving the healthcare financial experience for patients and providers. We partner with the most important institutions in the healthcare space that are vital to the care provided in our communities. Our technology enables patients to understand the cost of their healthcare and have a flawless experience when trying to afford and manage their healthcare needs.

Our team is comprised of engineers, physicians, and data scientists; all united by our passion to improve our healthcare system. We are based in New York, NY and are backed by some of the best investors in New York and Silicon Valley including Thrive Capital and Founders Fund.

A perfect opportunity for those looking for opportunities to make real impact to our product as well as the wider world in an early-stage startup with huge potential for learning and growth.

Some of the technologies we use: Python/Django, JavaScript, React, Postgres, Redis, AWS.

We have openings for Full Stack Engineer and DevOps Engineer. We also have openings for Forward Deployed Engineers. FDEs are full-stack engineers who also work directly with our clients (healthcare providers) to make them successful on Cedar.

Apply at https://boards.greenhouse.io/careportalinc or email careers@cedar.com

Typical interview process: 1 intro phone call, 1 technical phone screen/HackerRank , 1 onsite interview (~3 hours of technical interviews), 1 take home (compensated), 1 onsite (~3 hours to get to know the team better)
